item.title: Main Deck Cargo Door – Electrical Control (Open/Close) System

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures for opening and closing cargo door are established and used.

placard.para: Placard Main Deck Cargo Door Opening and Closing Electrical Function "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The DMP is required for any portion that does not operate normally.

numlitem.para: Locate the Main Cargo Door control valve in the left main gear wheel well.
Put the control valve lever found in the left main gear wheel well to the "OPEN" position (POS 1).
Locate the hydraulic hand pump found just below the Main Cargo Door control valve in the left main gear wheel well.
Install the manual pump handle onto the hydraulic hand pump and operate the hand pump until the Main Cargo Door is in the OPEN position.

warning.para: KEEP PERSONS AND EQUIPMENT AWAY FROM THE MAIN CARGO DOOR. THE DOOR CAN FALL WHEN THE CONTROL VALVE LEVER IS MOVED AND CAN CAUSE INJURY OR DAMAGE.

numlitem.para: Locate the Main Cargo Door control valve in the left main gear wheel well.
Put the control valve lever to the "CLOSE" position (POS 2).
Locate the hydraulic hand pump found just below the Main Cargo Door control valve in the left main gear wheel well.
Install the manual pump handle onto the hydraulic hand pump.
Operate the hand pump until the Main Cargo Door is in the CLOSED and LOCKED position.

note.para: Main Cargo Door may free-fall during this step.

numlitem.para: Verify the Main Cargo Door is closed and locked. This may be verified by checking EICAS, door control panel indications, or by visual inspection of the door lock indicators.
